item.title: The repoze.who LDAP plugin will be an official plugin
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description: Some weeks ago I was invited to make repoze.who.plugins.ldap an official repoze.who plugin, which means that: The license will change. It will use Repoze’s. The development tools will be migrated from Launchpad (bug tracker, repository, etc). The LDAP plugin’s documentation will be included into repoze.who’s. item.title: Enable LDAP authentication in your WSGI applications!
item.dc:creator: Gustavo
item.description: repoze.who.plugins.ldap is an straightforward yet powerful solution to enable LDAP authentication in your WSGI application. It enables you to have LDAP authentication working in your new or existing applications, in few minutes and with few lines of code!
